channel.title: Tomasz Kyc Webpage and Blog

item.title: Database connection tester
item.description: Simple database connection tester console application. Stupidly easy to use and supports Microsoft SQL Server, Oracle and MySQL. Click here to go to GitHub repo. ðŸ’ª

item.title: Film details searcher
item.description: film_details_searcher is a small tool to search film details right from the command line. It use a polish movie online website Filmweb and Google to find a result. Click here to go to GitHub repo. ðŸ’ª

item.title: Recognize photo app
item.description: Simple app to recognize photo objects using Microsoft Azure Cognitive Services. Click here to go to GitHub repo. ðŸ’ª

item.title: Christmas time and New Year's Eve - time for summary
item.description: Hello fellows. I hope you’re doing well and maybe bake some delicious christmas cakes. That was a preety long year for me. Especially when I list some events there: Learning .NET Core and Angular Making diploma project and finishing my CS studies with 5.0 grade Developing my Java and Python skills Unexpected changing a job (which maybe I will describe in the future) But now it’s time to slow down, take a deep breath and spend some time with closest people out there.

item.title: Link Shorter First Project in Dotnet Core
item.description: This took too long time, but here it is A while back, I’ve started learning .NET Core (and it’s still in progress). But as a result and in some way training I made an web app… to make your links shorter! Here you can check the repo with code and additional info. What next? Maybe another .NET Core project? I wanted to do this but there are also other skills I need to develop and they just can’t wait ðŸ˜… Also in this semester I have to write my thesis and pass 5 other exams soo a lot of work to do and not too much time.

item.title: New project coming to town - about ASP.NET Core
item.description: December is a great time to… start learning new things. You know - the atmosphere of New Year’s resolution and bringing somethink new to… your projects and skills. ASP.NET 3.5 Web Forms - what a … At the universtity this year I’ve started classes “Web application programming”. I thought it would be… wait for it… breathtakingm but it is not. We are learning a little old. We are learning outdated technology which for me - it’s a little bit puzzling.

item.title: Welcome Post
item.description: Welcome to my webpage and I’m glad you’re reading this! This is a first post I’ve written here and probably not last :wink:. Why I created this website? That’s a tricky question. Probably because I wanted to gather information and knowledge in one place where I can share with others. Also it can be a space where I can share with you some materials about technologies I’m working with (checkout about section).
